description:
Usopp`s friends run away with the heiress Kaya. Jango races off after them, but not before sending Butchie into a berserk rage. As Zoro continues his battle, Luffy takes on Captain Kuro.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Beat Kuro! Usopp the Man`s Tearful Resolve!
Kuro o Taose! Otoko Usopp Namida no Ketsui!
La bataille contre Kuro ! La détermination d`Usopp
اهزم كورو! عزيمة الرجل أوسوب الباكية!
เอาชนะคุโระ! ความมุ่งมันของอุซป!
クロを倒せ! 男ウソップ涙の決意!
打倒克洛！男子汉乌索普悲痛的决定！
